content: July 30 Two southern Californians were criminally charged over their alleged roles in a conspiracy to steal 94 000 credit and debit card numbers from Michaels Companies Inc customers  in a prominent 2011 cyberattack affecting the largest U.S. arts and crafts retailer.
name: The Michaels Companies Inc
title: Two charged in 2011 cyber breach at Michaels retailer
